tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Doctor Sunayana for the gynelogical problems faced by my wife especially the side effects of growing fibroids. The USG and MRI also indicated Adenomyosis and cysts and we were quite worried. The doctor explained to us about the issue, the treatment, risks and side effects. She also explained about the technicalities of the harmonic laproscopy and the short discharge and recovery time. She came across as quite professional, confident, calm amd empathetic. She assured us of an effective treatment. The operation went through successfully and we are quite happy with recovery. I would recommend her given our experience.

I have been consulting Dr. Sunayna since last 10 years. She has been instrumental in solving my gynecological related issues and thereby facilitating  the birth of my son who is now 9 years old healthy baby.
Just few days back she has treated me for fibroids; I used to feel severe stomach pain during my periods since last 2 years, had consulted other doctors prior to finally reaching out to Dr.Sunayna. After meeting Dr.Sunayna, I received the proper guidance consultation and most importantly cleared all the my doubts and removed whatever fear and myths I had about Fibroids. I took the treatment, being operated through laser treatment and now I am back to my normal best within few days..

Strongly recommend her for any gynecological related treatment.

It was a really good experience to be treated under Dr.Sunayana.
I was really very anxious of with my menstrual problems..When I went to her...she heard me out with all the patience and explained me the phenomena in very simple language...
Gave me lifestyle tips and changes along with dietary changes.
She is very polite and friendly.
She is very particular and a scholar at her work , I greatly recommend her to many of my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: a very patient friendly doctor..she will make you feel at home and will half your pain from her entirely positive attitude only plus she is available 24*7.   this is not paid promotion..this is an honest feedback from her patient..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She understands our ailment and prescribes essential medicines only. Doctor is very friendly and just a call away in case of emergency.

Fabulous Dr I ever met.
I got our son just because she's honest and compassionate with her work. 
Dr Sunaina gives right advice at a very right time.
The service that I receive from dr Sunaina is excellent.

review: She is really kind and helpful. I would suggest to meet the doctor in any need.
